description: This file defines and exports functions related to bug report operations such as listing, retrieving, updating, and exporting bug reports. It acts as an API client module for bug report endpoints in the WebDashboardFrontend project.

methods.name: listBugReports({ status, severity, search, page = 1, pageSize = 10 } = {})
methods.description: Fetches a list of bug reports with optional filters for status, severity, search term, and pagination parameters.

methods.name: getBugReport(id)
methods.description: Retrieves a specific bug report by its ID.

methods.name: updateBugReport(id, payload)
methods.description: Updates a specific bug report identified by its ID with given payload data.

methods.name: exportBugReports(format = "json", filters = {})
methods.description: Triggers the export of bug reports in the specified format, possibly with filters applied, and returns the exported Blob.

calls: apiGet("/api/bug-reports", { status, severity, search, page, pageSize })

ctags.name: listBugReports
ctags.pattern: /^export async function listBugReports({ status, severity, search, page = 1, pageSize = 10 } = {})/
